actions.description: The hulk makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The hulk makes a separate Slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Reaping Arms (Recharge 5-6)

name: Star Spawn Hulk [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.
specialTraits.name: Psychic Mirror
